scripts.docker:deploy: kubectl apply --context ericaskari -f deployment.injected.yml && kubectl delete pods --all -n app-sbma
scripts.watch:op: APP_ENV=local op run --no-masking --env-file=.env.op npm run watch
scripts.watch:deploy: cat deployment.yml  | APP_ENV=prod op inject > deployment.injected.yml && nodemon --watch './**/*' -e '*'  --delay 2.5 --exec 'npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run docker:deploy'
